name: Mind Palace
description:
Explore your own notes in this experimental VR journey. Climb, jump & slide along the way on your adventure of building your personal Mind Palace. Make connections and place categories to arrange your notes in memorable places.

Explore the world


Traverse an open world with many paths with different movement styles:
  • smooth locomotion
  • climbing
  • jumping
  • sliding

Visit your own notes


Import your own notes including images, audio and links.
Currently following note formats are supported:
  • Obsidian
  • Notion
  • plain text list of notes

Build your palace


Make connections between notes and spark new ideas.
Relocate categories, delete notes and write what's on your mind - several tools help you to create your personal palace:
  • drawboard
  • hammer
  • flashlight
  • inventory jar

more

  • 1+ hour original soundtrack
  • tutorial
  • bird & fruit fast travel
  • residents & animals
  • seated & standing mode
  • different bioms
